entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:49 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 09:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 9.0°C
Wind: 43 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. Temperature steady near 9.

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 11 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
